item.title: Kindle unlimited is it as good as it sounds?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:548164”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=667071.msg4461491#msg4461491 date=1417749124]

[quote author=Vain_ link=topic=667071.msg4460740#msg4460740 date=1417451004]

If you have a .edu email you can get prime for free, also.

“*Music, Movie & TV benefits available only after 6-month free trial.”

Damn
[/quote]but you get access to books for free, which is what we’re mainly talking about

Which to a college student is amazing.
[/quote]if you think your textbooks are gunna be on there you’re gunna have a bad time[/quote]
I realized this soon after actually looking into it.

Read full topic

item.title: Kindle unlimited is it as good as it sounds?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

so 10 a month for unlimited copies of books to read which equates to 120 a year

or 99 a year for unlimited copies of books to read, videos, TV streams, music, and 2 day shipping.

prime is better?
